text: 17 The DBMS needs to remove reclaimable physical versions from the database over time. — No active txn in the DBMS can “see” that version (SI). — The version was created by an aborted txn. Two additional design decisions: —> How to look for expired versions? —> How to decide when it is safe to reclaim m T 4 S EJ % 56:02/1:09:33 - Garbage Collection > - - —à t" .- CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
